document_data.name: Plant Renewal
document_data.mainbody: '''''Plant renewal''''' was an [[alteration]] [[spell]] that healed and purified any living plant.
document_data.Effects:
When cast, this spell completely rejuvenated any single plant. It destroyed any predatory insects, mold, fungi or other harmful lifeforms; caused fruit to bloom and flowers to blossom; and ''dispelled'' any [[illusory]] effects.

This spell could not be used to bring dead plants back to a state of living.
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell were inscribed upon the [[Eldath]]yn [[relic]], the ''[[Crystrum of Tranquility]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a single drop of rain, or dew that was collected on a night when the moon was in view.
